newsitem.title: USA: Investor named to GRC International board.
newsitem.headline: Investor named to GRC International board.

text.p: Frank Cilluffo, an investor who holds an 18.4 percent stake in GRC International Inc, said Wednesday he was named a director of the company on October 15.
Cilluffo said he requested for a board seat on October 7, through his company Cilluffo Associates, a New York-based investment partnership.
Cilluffo, who is managing director of the partnership, had prodded GRC to hire an investment bank to advise the company on strategic alternatives, including a merger or sale of the company.
GRC announced October 7 it had hired Smith Barney Inc for the purpose.
Cilluffo's investment partner in GRC, Edward Meyer, a retired general, is also a director of GRC.
